body:
Greetings Avicus, 

After some deep thought, we have decided to initiate the introduction of the flat gang. If you are completely and utterly confused, the 'flat' joke started between myself and UmbreonMessiah a while ago when he labeled my map flat. If you would liek the privilege of joining this gang, please fill out the following application:

How tough are ya?:
What's your view on the current state of the flat people?:
How well do you speak Flatish (provide an example please)?:
How do you know when someones flat?:
How are you known for being flat?:

Owners:
xArcturus
Mango_

Current members: 
GrapeSmoothie
NinjaBridge
pavilion99
timaeusTestified

How do you know when someones flat?: When that person looks like Sli
How are you known for being flat?: Sli calls me flat all of the time. I constantly use the word flat in english papers as well.

Without any milk.

replies.body: M8 they named IHOP after me. International House Of Pancakes, here's how they named it. They took my name, rileguy, and put the "e" in front of the "r" and added "int" in front of that. Then they did "nat" then the "i" in my name then "ona" then the "l" from my name. Now if you take guy and you take the "u" out of it, it translates into "house" in the language of Flat. Gy means "Of Pancakes" in RilEngish and hence the name IHOP. COME AT ME BRO!!!!

replies.body:
Denied?! Dammit, making new app IDC.

How tough are ya: tougher than iron man, the hulk, Thor, spooderman and brokenvacuum combined
What's your view on the current state of the flat people: one day, flat people will rool the world (gotta long way to go though)
How well do you speak Flatish (provide an example please)?: here goes: oh brokenvacuum, you are so flat and broken. You need fixing. Get to the repair shop pls
How do you know when someones flat: They will be related to brokenvacuum in many ways: (facial expression, body movements, way they creepily look at people.
How are you known for being flat: I'm skinny in real life, does that count?
